title: Former Congressman: Enhanced Interrogation Techniques Can Be Valuable
teaser: Robert Siegel talks to Peter "Pete" Hoekstra, who was chair of the House Intelligence Committee from 2004-2007. He talks about the Senate Intelligence Committee's so-called torture report and talks about what he knew of the offenses at the time, and what he thinks of the report today.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
